REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2107 reute u f BC-JEFFERIES-MAKING-MARK 03-19 0041

TEXT.TITLE: JEFFERIES MAKING MARKET IN COMDATA NETWORK<CDN>
TEXT.BODY: Jefferies and Co said it is making a market in Comdata Network at 16-1/2 to 17. The stock was halted on the New York Stock Exchange for dissemination of news at 15-1/8. Reuter
